title: I Can Change the World Portfolio
description:
Let kids change the world with this 20-poster coloring set. Each poster contains an original design poster that states messages of kindness and positivity. All posters are printed on cardstock with holographic foil embellishments. Remove the posters from the spiral bound portfolio, place in your windows and watch the smiles on the faces of those passing by. Be part of the movement for a kinder world.

  • Dimensions: 10.5 in x 10.8 in x 0.5 in
  • 20 inspiring posters to color and embellish
  • Sticker sheet with empowering messages and illustrations
  • Great gift for the young artist who wants to Change the World
